Uses of Interface
com.googlecode.swtfinder.core.finder.IConditionFind

Packages that use IConditionFind
com.googlecode.swtfinder.core.finder Provides finders and conditions 
 

Uses of IConditionFind in com.googlecode.swtfinder.core.finder
 

Classes in com.googlecode.swtfinder.core.finder that implement IConditionFind
 class ConditionClassAssignableFind
          This Condition checks if class of control to be checked is classV or subclass of classV.
 class ConditionCombinedFind
          This condition can combile an array of conditions, the check result is to "&&" each condition.
 class ConditionFalse
          a always false condition
 class ConditionFieldValue
          this Condition uses java reflection to check a special field of a Control.
 class ConditionGetTextFind
          this Condition checks the getText result of the Control to be checked.
 class ConditionMethodInvoke
          This Condition checks the result of a method,(method must have no para)
 class ConditionTagFind
          this condition checks the tags for the Control
 class ConditionTrue
          a always true condition
 

Methods in com.googlecode.swtfinder.core.finder with parameters of type IConditionFind
 org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control[] Finder.findAllByCondition(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control control, IConditionFind fc)
          find all the controls from control and all sub controls of this control
that accept condition fc
 org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control Finder.findIndexByCondition(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control control, IConditionFind fc, int index)
          find the index-ed control from control and all sub controls of this control
that accept condition fc
 org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control Finder.findOneByCondition(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control control, IConditionFind fc)
          find the only one control from control and all sub controls of this control that accept condition fc
